item.title: Four Thousand Weeks - Oliver Burkeman (2021)
item.description: Four Thousand Weeks [[Oliver Burkeman]] 2021 URL: Goodreads Status: #Finished Genres: [[Philosophy]], [[Time-Management]], [[Self-Improvement]] #content/book Mental Model MM:: Most productivity books imply that with enough optimisation, that you can fit everything into your life that you want to.

item.title: How to be Perfect - Mike Schur (2022)
item.description: How to be Perfect [[Mike Schur]] 2022 Goodreads Genres [[Ethics]], [[Morals]], [[Kindness]] Status:: #Finished Rating:: 4 Mental Model MM:: A whistle stop tour of the main philosophical thinkers and theorists and how they work in practice.

item.title: Kaizen - Sarah Harvey (2020)
item.description: Kaizen Sarah Harvey 2020 URL:: Goodreads My Rating: 2.5 Genres: [[Habits]], [[Japan]], [[Mindfulness]] #content/book Mental Model MM:: Kaizen is an approach to life revolving around continuous improvement, themes similar to those presented in Atomic Habits - James Clear (2018) or Make Time; namely, ways to slowly steer your life to your desired destination through a series of small, incremental improvements.

item.title: Someday Is Today - Matthew Dicks (2022)
item.description: Someday Is Today - Matthew Dicks (2022) Up:: [[Books]] Someday Is Today [[Matthew Dicks]] 2022 URL: Goodreads Status:: #Live Rating:: 4 Started:: [[2022-06-17 Fri]] Finished:: [[2022-07-01 Fri]] Genres: [[Time-Management]], [[Motivation]], [[Meaning]] #content/book Mental Model MM:: Someday is Today is a set of 22 ways in which you can make more of your time, with harsh home truths about what happens if you do not!

item.title: Taste - Stanley Tucci (2021)
item.description: ðŸ“˜ Taste [[Stanley Tucci]] 2021 URL: Goodreads Status:: #Summary Rating:: 3.5 Genres: [[Food]], [[Family]], [[Italy]] #content/book Mental Model MM:: Acclaimed actor, author and homely cook Stanley Tucci takes the reader on a tour of his childhood, acting and philosophy through the means of food.

item.title: Tough - Terry Crews (2022)
item.description: Tough [[Terry Crews]] 2022 URL: Goodreads Status:: #Finished Rating:: 2.5 Genres: [[Self-Improvement]], [[Discipline]], [[Family]] #content/book Mental Model MM:: Terry Crews recounts his life from being a young, abused boy watching his parents be either alcoholics or being pressured into a Christian cult, going through the NFL into his acting career and draws life lessons to give to the reader.

item.title: Wabi Sabi - Beth Kempton (2018)
item.description: Wabi Sabi [[Beth Kempton]] 2018 URL:: Goodreads My Rating: 4.5 Status: #Finished Genres: [[Mindfulness]], [[Spirituality]], [[Meaning]] #content/book Mental Model MM:: There is beauty in everyday objects, and the rituals we go through.
